dialogue.htmlContent: You use your keys to open the stone gates, and enter the fortress, with [npc.name] in tow.
The imps that once guarded the citadel have been defeated, and have all run away.

There are at least twenty imps and alpha-imps scattered around the courtyard. A few of them are simply loitering about, but most are engaged in simple tasks such as mending clothing, sparring, or cleaning. There are also a few who are openly having sex over in one corner.

None of these imps seem to be bothered about your presence, and you assume that it's because only someone with keys from the three demon leaders can gain access to the citadel, and therefore you must be an expected guest.

Although the gateway is mostly intact, there's a considerable amount of rubble and smashed rock piled up against the walls, and you're careful not to touch any of it in case you trigger another collapse.

From here, you look out over the rubble-strewn courtyard to see the ruined archway of the main keep. One of the huge wooden doors has completely splintered into pieces, while the other looks to be straining under the weight of the cracked masonry above.

[style.italicsBad(Please be aware that all of the citadel text is currently placeholder, and that there might be bugs! A more polished version (0.2.12.6) will be out before the weekend is over!)]

The stone blocks from which the gateway and walls are constructed have been carved from the dark black stone of the cavern. Looking out across the inner courtyard, you see that the material has been obtained by mining out a large portion of the far wall. Carved into this recess, there's a huge stone archway, which houses a pair of huge, iron-reinforced wooden doors.
You leave the fortress and head back out into Submission.
You tell [npc.name] to ready [npc.herself] for battle, before shouting out a challenge to all the imps in this citadel. They rush to attack you and your companion in defence of their fortress.

The six imps are no match for you and [npc.name], and you let out a triumphant laugh as the last of them falls to the floor, defeated.

Six more imps arrive from another part of the citadel, and jump forwards to attack!
This battle is far from over!
There are still a lot of imps remaining in the citadel!
It looks like you've beaten about half of the citadel's garrison!
There are almost no imp reinforcements left!
These are the very last defenders of the citadel!
You have defeated the imp army! You feel as though imps will never be much of a threat to you again!
You look down at the six defeated imps before you. While you were dealing with this last wave, the others have all run off, abandoning their comrades to whatever fate you have in store for them...
You tell the imps to get out of here while they still can.
You decide to take advantage of the imps, and, telling [npc.name] to stand aside and watch, you push them into position, ready to fuck them...
You decide to take advantage of the imps, and, telling [npc.name] to stand aside and watch, you gently push them into position, ready to have sex with them...
You decide to take advantage of the imps, and, telling [npc.name] to stand aside and watch, you roughly force them into position, ready to give them a good, hard fuck...
You feel sorry for the imps, having been abandoned by their friends, and offer to let them use your body...
You tell [npc.name] to join you in having sex with the imps.
You feel sorry for the imps, and tell [npc.name] to join you in submitting to them to make them feel better.
You tell [npc.name] to have fun fucking the imps as you watch.
You tell the imps that they can have some fun fucking [npc.name] while you watch.

The imps have defeated you. [citadelArcanist.name] reappears and #IF pc.isFeminine() #THEN #IF npc.isFeminine() #THEN demands that you and [npc.name] eat her out as punishment. #ELSE demands that you eat her out as punishment, while [npc.name] watches. #ENDIF #ELSE #IF npc.isFeminine() && game.isInvoluntaryNTREnabled() #THEN demands that [npc.name] eat her out as punishment, while you watch. #ELSE tells the imps to fuck you and [npc.name]. #ENDIF #ENDIF
The imps have defeated you. [npc2.Name] reappears and tells you that you're lucky your keys signify that you're a guest. She reluctantly tells the imps not to do anything to you.
You obediently drop to your knees and prepare to eat [npc2.name] out...
You eagerly drop to your knees and prepare to eat [npc2.name] out...
You try to resist as [npc2.name] pushes you to your knees and prepares to make you eat [npc2.herHim] out...
Having had [npc2.her] fun, [npc2.name] steps back and continues with [npc2.her] work. [npc2.She] dismisses you and [npc.name] as no threat, and tells you not to start any trouble again.

Having had [npc2.her] fun with you and [npc.name], [npc2.name] steps back and continues with [npc2.her] work. [npc2.She] dismisses you and your companion as no threat, and tells you not to start any trouble again.

The imps have defeated you, and seem to think that you and [npc.name] were doing this in the hopes that they'd fuck you. They seem convinced that this is your fetish, and are more than happy to help indulge you in it...
The imps have defeated you and [npc.name]. The leader tells you that you're lucky your keys signify that you're guests. The imps reluctantly leave you and your companion to recover.
You allow the imps to move you into position...
You eagerly allow the imps to move you into position...
Ignoring your struggles, the imps move you into position...
Having had their fun, the imps leave you collapsed on the floor to recover. They don't throw you out, as they still believe you were just fighting in order to get them to fuck you.

Having had their fun, the imps leave you and [npc.name] collapsed on the floor to recover. They don't throw the two of you out, as they still believe you were just fighting in order to get them to fuck you.
Having had your fun, you leave the imps to run off...
You take a few minutes to catch your breath and reflect on what you could have done differently in the fight, before continuing on your way...

You find yourself standing in the rubble-strewn courtyard of [siren.namePos] ruined citadel. Large, dark cracks split the stone floor and ceiling, and you have to weave around fallen boulders and smashed craters in order to continue forwards.

The large, stone courtyard has been flatten and carved to resemble cobblestone, and it makes a nice change to be walking over such an even surface compared to the uneven floor of the cavern. The huge, imposing archway of the main keep overlooks this area.
Description of the ruined well. A large portion of the cave's ceiling has fallen on the place where it once was, leaving no indication that a well ever stood here.
Description of the citadel's well. It looks to be completely functional, and from the splashes of water on the floor at its base, you can tell that is sees regular use.
Past the first few metres of the entranceway, the cells have completely caved-in. It's lucky there was nobody in there.
A block of four cells have been carved out of the cave's black rock, with the front of each one covered by heavy iron bars.
As all of the imps have been defeated, there's nobody in here...
There are a few imps loitering around in here, but they don't pay you much attention.
The rear half of the squat tower housing the citadel's laboratory has collapsed, but you're still able to venture a fair way inside before being halted by the rubble and debris.
A squat, one-story tower has been built in one side of the courtyard. It looks as though it was the original keep, before the current one was carved from the stone of the cave's wall.
Following your victory, [citadelArcanist.name] and the imps that were stationed in this laboratory have all fled.

The interior reminds you of Lilaya's laboratory, and, while containing less equipment, this one looks to be far more productive. There's a potion production line, and you see a lesser-youko overseer working on enchanting various items of food and drink into transformative potions.

The interior reminds you of Lilaya's laboratory, and, while containing less equipment, this one looks to be far more productive. There's a potion production line, and you see the lesser-youko overseer, [citadelArcanist.name], working on enchanting various items of food and drink into transformative potions.

You approach the arcanist, who introduces [npc2.herself] as [npc2.name].

#IF pc.getRace()==RACE_FOX_MORPH #THEN #IF npc.getRace()==RACE_FOX_MORPH #THEN [npc2.She] says that [npc2.she] has a fox-girl TF potion, but as you and [npc.name] are already foxes, she's unwilling to waste it on you. #IF pc.isFeminine() #THEN #IF npc.isFeminine() #THEN She says how she finds feminine foxes irresistible, and offers you and [npc.name] a taste of her pussy. #ELSE She says that she doesn't like masculinity, so while she's happy for you to come and have a taste of her pussy, [npc.name] must only watch. #ENDIF #ELSE #IF npc.isFeminine() #THEN She says that she doesn't like masculinity, so while she's happy for [npc.name] to come and have a taste of her pussy, you must only watch. #ELSE She says that she doesn't like masculinity, but if you come back having feminised yourself, she'd offer you a taste of her pussy. #ENDIF #ENDIF #ELSE [npc2.She] says that [npc2.she] has a fox-girl TF potion that she wants to test. Asks if [npc.name] would like to have a taste. #ENDIF #ELSE #IF npc.getRace()==RACE_FOX_MORPH #THEN [npc.She] says that [npc.she] has a fox-girl TF potion that she wants to test. Asks if you'd like to have a taste. #ELSE [npc2.She] says that [npc2.she] has a fox-girl TF potion that she wants to test. Asks if you and [npc.name] would like to have a taste. #ENDIF #ENDIF

You approach [npc2.name] again.

#IF pc.getRace()==RACE_FOX_MORPH #THEN #IF npc.getRace()==RACE_FOX_MORPH #THEN [npc2.She] says that [npc2.she] has a fox-girl TF potion, but as you and [npc.name] are already foxes, she's unwilling to waste it on you. #IF pc.isFeminine() #THEN #IF npc.isFeminine() #THEN She says how she finds feminine foxes irresistible, and offers you and [npc.name] a taste of her pussy. #ELSE She says that she doesn't like masculinity, so while she's happy for you to come and have a taste of her pussy, [npc.name] must only watch. #ENDIF #ELSE #IF npc.isFeminine() #THEN She says that she doesn't like masculinity, so while she's happy for [npc.name] to come and have a taste of her pussy, you must only watch. #ELSE She says that she doesn't like masculinity, but if you come back having feminised yourself, she'd offer you a taste of her pussy. #ENDIF #ENDIF #ELSE [npc2.She] says that [npc2.she] has a fox-girl TF potion that she wants to test. Asks if [npc.name] would like to have a taste. #ENDIF #ELSE #IF npc.getRace()==RACE_FOX_MORPH #THEN [npc.She] says that [npc.she] has a fox-girl TF potion that she wants to test. Asks if you'd like to have a taste. #ELSE [npc2.She] says that [npc2.she] has a fox-girl TF potion that she wants to test. Asks if you and [npc.name] would like to have a taste. #ENDIF #ENDIF

You approach [npc2.name] again.

#IF pc.isFeminine() #THEN #IF npc.isFeminine() #THEN She says how she'd like to reward you for testing her potion, and offers you and [npc.name] a taste of her pussy. #ELSE She says that she doesn't like masculinity, so while she's happy for you to come and have a taste of her pussy, [npc.name] must only watch. #ENDIF #ELSE #IF npc.isFeminine() #THEN She says that she doesn't like masculinity, so while she's happy for [npc.name] to come and have a taste of her pussy, you must only watch. #ELSE She says how she'd like to reward you for testing her potion, but she doesn't like masculinity. If you were to come back having feminised yourself, she'd offer you a taste of her pussy. #ENDIF #ENDIF
You decline the offer of the TF potion, and leave [npc2.name] to her work.
You accept [npc2.namePos] offer of performing oral sex on her, and drop to your knees. [npc.Name] steps back to watch and wait for you to finish.
You tell [npc.name] to perform oral sex on [npc2.name], and [npc.she] obediently drops to [npc.her] knees. You step back to watch and wait for your companion to finish.
You accept [npc2.namePos] offer of performing oral sex on her, and both you and [npc.name] drop to your knees.

You think it's time to put a stop to [citadelArcanist.namePos] potion manufacturing, and attack! She disappears right before your eyes as you strike, and you realise that she was using an illusion to talk to you this whole time!

Her echoing laughter alerts the imps in the citadel, and you prepare to fight them off.
You accept [npc2.namePos] offer, and drink the potion.
[npc2.Name] is delighted with how it turned out, and steps up to rub against you, before offering to let you eat her out.
You refuse [npc2.namePos] offer of performing oral sex on her, and step back, leaving her to her work.
You accept [npc2.namePos] offer of performing oral sex on her, and drop to your knees.
You accept [npc2.namePos] offer, and tell [npc.name] to drink the potion.
[npc2.Name] is delighted with how it turned out, and steps up to rub against your companion, before offering to let [npc.herHim] eat her out.
You refuse [npc2.namePos] offer of letting [npc.name] perform oral sex on her, and leave her to her work.
You accept [npc2.namePos] offer of letting [npc.name] perform oral sex on her, and tell your companion to drop to [npc.her] knees.
You accept [npc2.namePos] offer, and both you and [npc.name] share the potion. You drink half first.
[npc.Name] finishes the rest of the potion.
[npc2.Name] is delighted with how it turned out, and steps up to rub against you and your companion, before offering to let the two of you eat her out.
You refuse [npc2.namePos] offer of oral sex, and leave her to her work.
You accept [npc2.namePos] offer of oral sex, and both you and [npc.name] drop to your knees.
[npc2.Name] pushes you away from her, before taunting you by asking if you were expecting to be allowed to orgasm.
[npc2.Name] pushes [npc.name] away from her, before taunting [npc.her] by asking if [npc.she] was expecting to be allowed to orgasm.
[npc2.Name] pushes the two of you away from her, before taunting you both by asking if you were expecting to be allowed to orgasm.
The treasury is mostly caved-in. You've already found everything of value that was hidden amongst the rubble...
The treasury is mostly caved-in, but you might be able to find something of value if you were to spend some time searching amongst the rubble...

You spend a while searching through the rubble, and not only find a considerable amount of flames, but also a huge, undamaged wardrobe. Prying it open, you discover what appears to be a spare set of [siren.namePos] clothes, along with a matching twin to her scythe!

The keep is almost completely collapsed - it's a miracle everyone was able to escape unharmed. It looks like you could carefully climb over some of the rubble to gain access to the room behind where the Siren's throne once stood.
The keep is carved out of the stone wall of the cavern. You could use your keys to open the stone gates, or back away and return another time.
You decide to back off and return another time...

You unlock the gates with your keys and enter the keep.

Find yourself in a stone hall, and, waiting for you, are the three demons that you met in the other fortresses. Behind them, on a raised dias, is a stone throne, and sitting on it is their leader, the Dark Siren.

She is a surprisingly small and young half-succubus - she appears to be just over 5 feet tall and no older than eighteen or nineteen. Unlike all the other succubi you've seen, she is lacking a sexy, womanly body. She has an almost completely-flat chest, a small ass, and girly hips.

She's wearing a witch's outfit, with a purple-trimmed cape. She's also got an impressive pentagram-themed amulet around her neck, and, curiously, a medicinal-looking, square, white eyepatch over her right eye.

She proceeds with some extremely embarrassing dialogue, part of which involves revealing her true name of '[siren.name]' to you.

You'll have to fight her demon lieutenants first!

You unlock the gates with your keys and enter the keep.

Find yourself in a stone hall, and, waiting for you, are the three demons that you met in the other fortresses. Behind them, on a raised dias, is a stone throne, and sitting on it is their leader, the Dark Siren.

She is outraged that you escaped the cells, but you'll be back in there soon enough!

You'll have to fight her demon lieutenants first!
Telling the Siren about Lyssieth's ring would undoubtedly raise her suspicions. Once you've dealt with these demons, you could find an opportunity to trick her into wearing it.

You challenge the Siren to a duel. The demons visibly flinch from second-hand embarrassment, but you think they're just flinching from fear.

[siren.Name] orders her demon lieutenants to stand aside, and agrees to face you one-on-one!

You have defeated the demons!

[siren.Name] orders her demon lieutenants to stand aside, and prepares to face you one-on-one!
You could try to trick [siren.name] into wearing Lyssieth's ring!

You tell [npc.name] to surrender - after all, she stands no chance against someone with Lyssieth's power. You hold up the ring to show her what you mean.

[npc.Name] screams to give that back - it's her mother's, and you have no right to hold it!

You refuse, but continue holding it up in a way that would be easy to have it knocked from your [pc.hand]. [npc.Name] falls for your trick, and casts a weak version of slam to force the ring to the floor. She uses telekenesis to snatch it and put it on.

As the enslavement text appears in the air before her (saying special slave - direct transportation to Lyssieth), she realises she's been tricked, and just before she gets teleported to Lyssieth's palace, she casts Siren's call.

At first it appears as though all it caused was some discomfort from the loud screech, but the ground starts rumbling, and fissures start appearing in the ground. A huge chunk of rock falls from the ceiling and crushes her throne. The keep starts collapsing!

You turn to see the demon lieutenants rushing out of the door, and you hurry to follow them!

You run out of the keep to see that the last of the imps are rushing out of the main gateway. Dodging falling boulders and collapsing masonry, you manage to make it out in time.

As you exit the citadel, you come face-to-face with a group of Lyssieth's guard. (They'd been waiting in ambush to try and capture DS). They demand to know what happened.

You explain what happened to the guard leader. She is thankful for apprehending DS for them, and says that if you ever have business with Lyssieth, she'll vouch for you. They then leave.

You wonder if you should explore the ruins...

You explain to the guards that you enslaved DS, and she should now be in Lyssieth's palace. One of them is carrying a strange purple stone, and she says that what you're saying is the truth.

Their leader says that if you ever have business with Lyssieth, they'll vouch for you. They then leave.

You wonder if you should explore the ruins...

As [npc.name] realises that she's about to be defeated, she takes off her eyepatch, and with the last of her energy, casts Siren's call.

At first it appears as though all it caused was some discomfort from the loud screech, but the ground starts rumbling, and fissures start appearing in the ground. A huge chunk of rock falls from the ceiling and crushes her throne (thankfully without [npc.name] sitting on it!). The citadel starts collapsing!

You turn to see the demon lieutenants rushing out of the door!

[npc.speech(H-Help!)] [npc.name] cries, clearly too exhausted to escape without aid...

You aren't willing to risk your life to save [npc.name]! You rush out of the door, leaving her behind.

Once out in the courtyard, you see [impMaleLeader.name] running back towards you. He rushes past you and charges into the collapsing citadel.

You run out of the keep to see that the last of the imps are rushing out of the main gateway. Dodging falling boulders and collapsing masonry, you manage to make it out in time.

As you exit the citadel, you come face-to-face with a group of Lyssieth's guard. (They'd been waiting in ambush to try and capture DS). As [impMaleLeader.name] exits the citadel, carrying [siren.name] in his arms, the guards push him away and arrest her.

They then demand to know what happened.

Even though she was your enemy a moment ago, you can't just leave [npc.name] behind like this! Dodging a falling chunk of the ceiling, you rush over to where she's lying on the floor, and pick her up. (TODO size difference description)

With [npc.name] in your [pc.arms], you run out of the keep to see that the last of the imps are rushing out of the main gateway. Dodging falling boulders and collapsing masonry, you manage to make it out in time.

Realising what you've just done, [siren.name] blushes as she looks up into your eyes. [siren.speech(Y-You saved me...)]

As you exit the citadel, you come face-to-face with a group of Lyssieth's guard. (They'd been waiting in ambush to try and capture DS). They order you to step back and move to arrest [siren.name]. You reall yhave no choice but to do as they say - even if you were able to defeat the guards, you really don't want to get on the wrong side of Lyssieth.

They then demand to know what happened.
The demons have defeated you!
[npc.Name] has defeated you! She makes sure her demon lieutenants are ok, before sitting on her throne.

[npc.Name] laughs, and, taking great pleasure from this, she orders her demon lieutenants to throw you out of the citadel.

As you're dragged out, she shouts that it was a lot of fun beating someone like you, and to come back when you've recovered, so she can beat you all over again.

The demons drag you out of the citadel, and the imps all laugh at you as you're thrown out of the gates.

Brushing yourself off, you prepare to continue on your way...

[npc.Name] laughs, and, taking great pleasure from this, she asks each of her demon lieutenants what they'd do with you if they had you as their bitch.

[impMaleLeader.Name] says he'd turn you into the imp's breeding bitch. He suggests that you could also be milked to generate income for [npc.name].

[impAlphaLeader.Name] says she'd punish you and turn you into a futa, so that you can be used as a fuck-toy. She suggests that you could be locked in bondage and forced to perform degrading acts for [npc.namePos] amusement.

[impFemalesLeader.Name] says she'd make sure you have a nice big cock and lots of cum, then use you as a female imp breeder. She suggests you could also be used to fuck any trespassers.

[npc.Name] tells you to choose your fate. If you refuse, she'll let the demons decide amongst themselves as to who gets to have fun with you.
